Powers.DescLong: The Dire Wolf breathes out freezing air in a broad cone in front of it chilling all foes for Moderate Cold damage and lingering Cold Damage over time.  Affected foes will also have their movement and attack speeds reduced.  Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long

The beast lunges and sinks their teeth into the victim before tearing viciously. Maiming Bite causes Moderate Lethal damage and reduces the target's movement speed moderately for a short time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
This power has a chance to grant a charge of Pack Mentality.
This power has a chance to grant a charge of Pack Mentality.
